original_title: Falling tree kills two, injures three in Akuressa
original_body_lines: Two persons died and three others were injured after a tree fell on a garage at Amalagoda in Akeressa this morning.
Police said five persons were in the garage when the tree had fallen and one person had died on the spot.
The other 04 were seriously injured and admitted to the Akuressa hospital where another one died.
The other three injured were admitted to the Karapitiya Hospital for further treatment.
The deceased are aged 28 and 65 and are residents of Malawa, Akuressa.
